mapper.insert: insert into DS_CMS_CATEGORY_EDIT (ID, SITEID, STATUS, METAKEYWORDS, METADESCRIPTION, SUMMARY, RELEASETIME, RELEASESOURCE, RELEASEUSER, IMG, CONTENT, URL, EDITID, EDITNAME, EDITTIME, AUDITSTATUS, AUDITID, AUDITNAME, AUDITTIME, MSG, JSONDATA) values (#{id}, #{siteid}, #{status}, #{metakeywords}, #{metadescription}, #{summary}, #{releasetime}, #{releasesource}, #{releaseuser}, #{img}, #{content}, #{url}, #{editid}, #{editname}, #{edittime}, #{auditstatus}, #{auditid}, #{auditname}, #{audittime}, #{msg}, #{jsondata})
mapper.update: update DS_CMS_CATEGORY_EDIT set STATUS=#{status}, METAKEYWORDS=#{metakeywords}, METADESCRIPTION=#{metadescription}, SUMMARY=#{summary}, RELEASETIME=#{releasetime}, RELEASESOURCE=#{releasesource}, RELEASEUSER=#{releaseuser}, IMG=#{img}, CONTENT=#{content}, URL=#{url}, EDITID=#{editid}, EDITNAME=#{editname}, EDITTIME=#{edittime}, AUDITSTATUS=#{auditstatus}, AUDITID=#{auditid}, AUDITNAME=#{auditname}, AUDITTIME=#{audittime}, MSG=#{msg}, JSONDATA=#{jsondata} where ID=#{id}
mapper.sql: a.ID, a.SITEID, a.STATUS, a.METAKEYWORDS, a.METADESCRIPTION, a.SUMMARY, a.RELEASETIME, a.RELEASESOURCE, a.RELEASEUSER, a.IMG, a.CONTENT, a.URL, a.EDITID, a.EDITNAME, a.EDITTIME, a.AUDITSTATUS, a.AUDITID, a.AUDITNAME, a.AUDITTIME, a.MSG, a.JSONDATA , b.NAME, b.SCOPE
mapper.select: select from DS_CMS_CATEGORY_EDIT a left join DS_CMS_CATEGORY b on a.ID=b.ID
